name: K-POP IDOL Trainer
description:
In this game we act as Director of K-POP group consisting of girls. Previously, the director had fame and money until at one point there was a conflict between the members of the group, after which all the members left the group and disembarked their road. The Director started to dig into his debts and to settle with them he had to sell everything he had. But fortunately at it after paid off with debts there was still money and it decides to rise by glory top anew.

This game in early-access!

Support me on Patreon to help fund games in the future!
